code: import returnOrders from'../../models/orders';let seedData=returnOrders();const initialState={orders:seedData,activeOrder:null};export default function orderReducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'db/orderAdded':{state.orders.concat(action.payload);return state;}case'service/orderCreated':{state.activeOrder=action.payload;return state;}default:return state;}}
